problem_names:
lemma actPres:
  fixes P    :: ccs
  and   Q    :: ccs
  and   Rel  :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   a    :: name
  and   Rel' :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"

  assumes "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"

  shows "\<alpha>.(P) \<leadsto><Rel> \<alpha>.(Q)"

lemma sumPres:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"

  assumes "P \<leadsto><Rel> Q"
  and     "Rel \<subseteq> Rel'"
  and     "Id \<subseteq> Rel'"

  shows "P \<oplus> R \<leadsto><Rel'> Q \<oplus> R"

lemma parPres:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"

  assumes "P \<leadsto><Rel> Q"
  and     "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     C1: "\<And>S T U. (S, T) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> (S \<parallel> U, T \<parallel> U) \<in> Rel'"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<leadsto><Rel'> Q \<parallel> R"

lemma resPres:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   x   :: name

  assumes "P \<leadsto><Rel> Q"
  and     "\<And>R S y. (R, S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> (\<lparr>\<nu>y\<rparr>R, \<lparr>\<nu>y\<rparr>S) \<in> Rel'"

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<leadsto><Rel'> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q"

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P    :: ccs
  and   Q    :: ccs
  and   Rel  :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Rel' :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"

  assumes "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     C1: "\<And>R S. (R, S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> R \<leadsto><Rel'> S"
  and     C2: "Rel \<subseteq> Rel'"

  shows "!P \<leadsto><bangRel Rel'> !Q"
translations:
lemma actPres:
  fixes P    :: ccs
  and   Q    :: ccs
  and   Rel  :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   a    :: name
  and   Rel' :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"

  assumes "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"

  shows "\<alpha>.(P) \<leadsto><Rel> \<alpha>.(Q)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  (P, Q) \<in> Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<alpha>.P \<leadsto><Rel> \<alpha>.Q
by(fastforce simp add: weakCongSimulation_def elim: actCases intro: weakCongAction)

lemma sumPres:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"

  assumes "P \<leadsto><Rel> Q"
  and     "Rel \<subseteq> Rel'"
  and     "Id \<subseteq> Rel'"

  shows "P \<oplus> R \<leadsto><Rel'> Q \<oplus> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> R \<leadsto><Rel'> Q \<oplus> R

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto><Rel> Q
  Rel \<subseteq> Rel'
  Id \<subseteq> Rel'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<oplus> R \<leadsto><Rel'> Q \<oplus> R
by(force simp add: weakCongSimulation_def elim: sumCases intro: weakCongSum1 weakCongSum2 transitionWeakCongTransition)

lemma parPres:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"

  assumes "P \<leadsto><Rel> Q"
  and     "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     C1: "\<And>S T U. (S, T) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> (S \<parallel> U, T \<parallel> U) \<in> Rel'"

  shows "P \<parallel> R \<leadsto><Rel'> Q \<parallel> R"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<parallel> R \<leadsto><Rel'> Q \<parallel> R

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<alpha> Q'.
       Q \<parallel> R \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          P \<parallel> R \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
          (P', Q') \<in> Rel'

proof (state)
goal (3 subgoals):
 1. \<And>P'.
       Q \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'a.
          P \<parallel> R \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P'a \<and>
          (P'a, P' \<parallel> R) \<in> Rel'
 2. \<And>Q'.
       R \<longmapsto>\<alpha> \<prec> Q' \<Longrightarrow>
       \<exists>P'.
          P \<parallel> R \<Longrightarrow>\<alpha> \<prec> P' \<and>
          (P', Q \<parallel> Q') \<in> Rel'
 3. \<And>P' Q' a.
       \<lbrakk>Q \<longmapsto>a \<prec> P';
        R \<longmapsto>coAction a \<prec> Q'; a \<noteq> \<tau>;
        \<alpha> = \<tau>\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> \<exists>P'a.
                            P \<parallel>
                            R \<Longrightarrow>\<tau> \<prec> P'a \<and>
                            (P'a, P' \<parallel> Q') \<in> Rel'

lemma resPres:
  fixes P   :: ccs
  and   Rel :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Q   :: ccs
  and   x   :: name

  assumes "P \<leadsto><Rel> Q"
  and     "\<And>R S y. (R, S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> (\<lparr>\<nu>y\<rparr>R, \<lparr>\<nu>y\<rparr>S) \<in> Rel'"

  shows "\<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<leadsto><Rel'> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<leadsto><Rel> Q
  (?R, ?S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow>
  (\<lparr>\<nu>?y\<rparr>?R, \<lparr>\<nu>?y\<rparr>?S) \<in> Rel'

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>P \<leadsto><Rel'> \<lparr>\<nu>x\<rparr>Q
by(fastforce simp add: weakCongSimulation_def elim: resCases intro: weakCongRes)

lemma bangPres:
  fixes P    :: ccs
  and   Q    :: ccs
  and   Rel  :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"
  and   Rel' :: "(ccs \<times> ccs) set"

  assumes "(P, Q) \<in> Rel"
  and     C1: "\<And>R S. (R, S) \<in> Rel \<Longrightarrow> R \<leadsto><Rel'> S"
  and     C2: "Rel \<subseteq> Rel'"

  shows "!P \<leadsto><bangRel Rel'> !Q"
